name: Ancient Tradition
description: You have devoted yourself to keeping the traditions of an ancient or lost culture alive and well, and you gain strength from your devotion to the old ways.
prerequisites: Knowledge (history) 3 ranks, must have a connection to a lost culture (see text)
benefit: Each lost culture has its own daily ritual, but none of them take more than 1 hour per day to perform. Once youâ€™ve performed the daily ritual, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the Daily Ritual entry for the culture in question. Specific cultures and their rituals are listed below.
